fields.title: My First Survey
fields.description: This is sample My First Survey. You can change definition or post survey! 👌
fields.question:
main:
  name: FirstSurvey
  fields:
  - name: gendar
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.RadioField
    field_args:
    - - - male
        - Male
      - - female
        - Female
      - - other
        - Other
    field_kwargs:
      label: Your gendar
      help_text: Please choice your gendar
      initial: other
      inline: true

  - name: favorite_food
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      label: what your favorite food?
      help_text: Please input your favorite food

  - name: favorite_animal
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.ChoiceWithBlankField
    field_args:
    - - - ''
        - ' --- Please choice your favorite animal 💖--- '
      - - cat
        - 😺Cat
      - - dog
        - 🐶Dog
      - - hourse
        - 🐴Hourse
      - - pig
        - 🐷Pig
      - - bear
        - 🐻Bear
    field_kwargs:
      label: what your favorite animal?
      help_text: Please choice your favorite animal

  - name: favorite_animal
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.ChoiceWithBlankField
    field_args:
    - - - ''
        - ' --- Please choice your favorite animal 💖--- '
      - - cat
        - 😺Cat
      - - dog
        - 🐶Dog
      - - hourse
        - 🐴Hourse
      - - pig
        - 🐷Pig
      - - bear
        - 🐻Bear
    field_kwargs:
      label: what your favorite animal?
      help_text: Please choice your favorite animal

  - name: favorite_language
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.MultipleCheckboxField
    field_args:
    - - - lang-python
        - Python Lang
      - - lang-c
        - C Lang
      - - lang-perl
        - Perl Lang
      - - lang-Go
        - Go Lang
      - - lang-php
        - PHP
    field_kwargs:
      label: what your favorite language?
      help_text: Please choice your favorite language
      required: true
      inline: true

  - name: agreement
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.CheckRequiredField
    field_kwargs:
      label: agreement
      help_text: Be sure to turn this on when posting

fields.title: My Second Survey
fields.description: This is sample My Second Survey. You can change definition or post survey! 👌
fields.question:
main:
  name: MySecondSerializer
  fields:
  - name: agreement_field
    field: BooleanField
    fields_kwargs:
      required: true
  - name: pet_choice_field
    field: MultipleChoiceField
    field_args:
    - - - dog
        - Dog
      - - cat
        - Cat
      - - horse
        - Horse

fields.title: My Third survey with code
fields.description:
me: "YAML file can contain a python code string..."
friend: "What you say!?"
fields.question:
main:
  name: TestSerializer
  fields:
  - name: test_field_one
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      label: Test Field One
      required: true
      help_text: Please enter 'correct_data' string.

      # Field validation method
    validate_method: |
      def validate_method(self, value):
          from rest_framework import serializers
          if value != "correct_data":
              raise serializers.ValidationError("'correct_data string' please")
          return value

  - name: test_field_two
    field: CharField

  # Serializer  validation method
  validate_method: |-
    def validate_method(self, data):
        from rest_framework import serializers
        if data["test_field_one"] != data["test_field_two"]:
            raise serializers.ValidationError({
                "test_field_two": "Please put the same as 'Test Field One'."
            })
        return data
